test_description: Verify Point-in-Polygon routing logic assigns correct Service Center based on lat/long coordinates
business_risk: Critical - Incorrect routing causes SLA breaches and operational failure
preconditions: PostGIS seeded with Service Areas; Service Request created
test_steps: 1. Define Service Area Polygon A; 2. Submit Service Request with lat/long inside A; 3. Verify assignment to Center A; 4. Submit request outside A; 5. Verify fallback logic
expected_result: Request routed to Center A within 100ms; Fallback routing triggers correctly
test_data_needs: GeoJSON Polygons; Coordinate pairs (boundary, inside, outside)
environment_requirements: Integration Env with geospatial DB support
failure_impact: Operational - Service requests lost or misrouted

test_description: Verify offline data synchronization and conflict resolution for job status updates
business_risk: High - Data loss leads to billing disputes and lost service history
preconditions: Mobile app authenticated; Device in airplane mode
test_steps: 1. Cache assigned jobs; 2. Go offline; 3. Update job status to 'Completed'; 4. Add completion notes; 5. Restore network; 6. Verify sync to backend
expected_result: Local changes queue persists; Sync triggers auto-reconnect; Server reflects 'Completed' status
environment_requirements: Physical Device or Emulator with network control
success_criteria: Zero data loss; Sync completes < 5s after reconnect
cleanup_requirements: Reset job status; Clear local DB

test_description: Verify Azure AI Document Intelligence integration handles low-quality invoice images gracefully
preconditions: Azure AI resource active; Valid/Invalid image set available
test_steps: 1. Upload blurry/low-res invoice image; 2. Trigger OCR process; 3. Verify Circuit Breaker logic if API times out; 4. Verify fallback to manual entry UI
expected_result: System attempts OCR; returns confidence score below threshold; prompts user for manual entry without crashing
tools_required: Jest; Nock (for API mocking); Azure SDK
accessibility_requirements: Error messages readable by screen readers
